ModMetaData.name: [A17] Moar Jobs Mod
ModMetaData.author: Bryan Bettis
ModMetaData.description: A combined version of my divided/additional jobs and job/task tweak mods. Each job/tweak can be enabled and in the mods settings (some jobs/tweaks have additional configuration options) and is configured separately for each save. If possible/practical will eventually be able to add it to existing saves, including saves that used some of my individual job/task tweak mods.
